attributes.title: Tyaga - The Greatest Strategy To Keep You Alive, Fresh And Ecstatic!
attributes.description:
Satsang Delivered on 19th February 2020
*PARAMASHIVA’S MESSAGE FROM SHRIKAILASA DIRECTLY :

*TYAGA - THE SUPERPOWER, SUPERFORCE OF KAILASA, FORMS INTENSE SPIRITUAL UMBILICAL CORD CONNECTION BETWEEN YOU AND PARAMASHIVA STRONGLY. POWERFULLY AND INTENSELY, IT CLEANSES, DETOXES YOUR WHOLE BEING. IT MAKES YOU MANIFEST THE STATE, SPACE, POWERS, BEING, SUPERCONSCIOUS AND SHRIKAILASA OF PARAMASHIVA. KEEP TYAGA ALIVE IN YOU.

*DEFINITION OF TYAGA: TYAGA IS FEROCIOUSLY ASSERTING THE ULTIMATE TRUTH - YOUR REALITY - AND DROPPING ALL THE DELUSORY, ILLUSORY IDENTITIES, INTERFERENCES AND INFERENCES DUE TO IT. GO ON WITH TYAGA.

*THE LIGHT BEING OF BOLEBABA - OF PARAMASHIVA - WILL START MANIFESTING IN YOU THE MOMENT YOU START LIVING WITH TYAGA AS YOUR FIRST PRINCIPLE. BE IN PARAMASHANTA SWARUPA. A ‘LIGHT BEING’ IS THE GREATEST GIFT YOU WILL MANIFEST WHEN YOU START LIVING TYAGA.

*I WILL EXPLAIN TYAGA FROM ALL ANGLES. TYAGA BRINGS SUCH POWERFUL MATURITY TO YOUR VERY EXISTENCE. ACTUALLY WHEN YOU START PRACTISING TYAGA, YOU WILL NOT LOSE ANY RESOURCES IN YOUR LIFE. YOU WILL LOSE ONLY DELUSIONS IN YOUR LIFE. YOU WILL HAVE AN AMAZING CAREER, WEALTH, HAPPY RELATIONSHIPS.

*RESOURCE IS NOTHING BUT HOW MANY PEOPLE YOU FEEL ONENESS WITH AND HOW MANY PEOPLE FEEL ONENESS WITH YOU. IT IS NOT AT ALL THE ZEROS IN YOUR BANK BALANCE. MONEY IN THE BANK MAY BE ONE ASPECT OF YOUR RESOURCE. BUT EVEN IF YOU HAVE A BILLION DOLLAR, YOU CANNOT MAKE A DEVOTEE WEAR JATA! THAT IS THE POWER OF ONENESS! I HAVE THAT KIND OF A FREEDOM OVER MY DEVOTEES! ONLY WHEN I FEEL THEIR ONENESS IS TOO SWEET, I FEEL THAT FREEDOM.

*FOR THE PAST TWO YEARS, A NEW LAYER OF DEVOTEES IS FORMING WHO HAVE NOT SEEN ME PHYSICALLY, WHO HAVE NOT TOUCHED MY FEET EVEN ONCE PHYSICALLY, WHO HAVE NOT FELT MY DARSHAN OR TOUCH EVEN ONCE PHYSICALLY.
*TYAGA WILL MAKE YOU HIGHLY MATURE. IT IS A MATURITY THAT IS REQUIRED FOR SUCCESS IN EVERY LEVEL - EITHER IN OUTER OR INNER WORLD - WHETHER JNANA, VIJNANA, OR PRAJNANA.

*TYAGA IS ‘RESOURCE’, NOT ‘RENUNCIATION’. I LOVE YOU AND I WILL TELL YOU THE TRUTH AS IT IS. I WILL NOT CHEAT YOU. TYAGA IS NOT THROWING AWAY SOMETHING. IT IS MATURITY SO THAT MANY THINGS MAY DROP FROM YOU. A RIPE FRUIT DROPS FROM THE TREE. IT IS NOT FORCIBLY PLUCKED AWAY FROM THE TREE. IT RIPENS, AND BECOMES READY TO FATHER A NEW TREE AND SO IT JUST DROPS. SAME WAY, BEAUTIFULLY TYAGA MAKES THINGS DROP FROM YOU.

*PARAMASHIVA IN THE MRUTYUNJAYA MANTRA TO MARKANDEYA MAHARISHI SAYS:

त्र्यम्बकं यजामहे
सुगन्धिं पुष्टिवर्धनम् ।
उर्वारुकमिव बन्धनान्
मृत्योर्मुक्षीय मामृतात् ॥

TRYAMBAKAṂ YAJĀMAHE SUGANDHIṂ PUṢṬI-VARDHANAM
URVĀRUKAM IVA BANDHANĀN MṚTYOR MUKṢĪYA MĀ 'MṚTĀT

IT MEANS: HOW THE CUCUMBER FALLS OFF FROM THE PLANT BY BECOMING MATURE.

*REMEMBER ABOUT YOURSELF: ‘I AM PARAMASHIVA. HOW CAN I BE THIS SILLY.’ WHETHER FEAR OR GREED OR ANGER OR ANY POWERLESSNESS RAISES IN YOU, THINK THIS, IT WILL IMMEDIATELY JUST DROP. THAT IS TYAGA.

त्यागेनैके अमृतत्वमानशुः
TYĀGĒNAIKĒ AMṚTATVAMĀNAŚUḤ

*IF YOU ARE A BILLIONAIRE AND A PERSON HAS STOLEN A BUCKET FROM OUTSIDE YOUR HOUSE, WILL YOU GO AND FIGHT WITH HIM AND BRING IT BACK? HE IS A POOR MAN AND IT COSTS ONE DOLLAR. OR IF YOU ARE A BILLIONAIRE AND YOU ARE SITTING WITH A CUP OF COFFEE AND A HOMELESS MAN TAKES IT AWAY, WILL YOU SHOOT HIM FOR IT? YOU WILL SAY, ‘GET HIM ONE MORE CUP.’ IF YOU SHOOT SOMEBODY FOR A CUP OF COFFEE, HOW SILLY YOU FEEL?

*IT IS MY SPIRITUAL INSTRUCTION AND GUIDANCE TO ALL MY FOLLOWERS AND DISCIPLES AND ANYONE WHO ACCEPTS ME AS THE SPIRITUAL HEAD: ‘ANYBODY ASKS FOR FOOD TO EAT OR TO COOK, NOT ONLY YOU SHOULD GIVE, YOU SHOULD PACK AND GIVE FOR THEIR IMMEDIATE DEPENDENTS ALSO.’

*I HEARD WORKERS ARE STEALING RICE, WHEAT FROM THE KITCHEN IN ADI KAILASH. PLEASE PACK AND GIVE THEM! WHY SHOULD THEY STEAL? GIVE THE INGREDIENTS ALSO FOR THEM TO COOK AND EAT.

*NOT JUST HUMAN BEINGS, BUT ALL LIVING BEINGS HAVE THE FUNDAMENTAL RIGHT OVER FOOD AND LIFE IN ALL MY TEMPLES AND AADHEENAMS. ONLY DANGEROUS, POISONOUS ANIMALS LIKE SNAKES CAN BE EXEMPTED WHEN THERE ARE GURUKUL BALASANTS THERE. THOSE BEINGS SHOULD BE SENT OUT AND SHOULD BE AVOIDED TO BE KILLED. IF YOU ARE NOT ABLE TO DRIVE THEM OUT OR IF THEY DIE, THEN OK. THERE IS NO OTHER RIGHT TO KILL ANY ANIMAL.


*TYAGA IS NOT ONLY THE GREATEST STRATEGY FOR THE OUTER WORLD AND INNER WORLD SUCCESS, IT IS THE GREATEST STRATEGY FOR KEEPING YOU ALIVE, FRESH, ALIVE, PLEASANT AND ECSTATIC EVERYDAY! IT INTENSELY MAKES YOUR DIGESTIVE ORGANS ALIVE. IT DETOXES YOUR SYSTEM. THE JATARAGNI BECOMES ALIVE!
